description: Life expectancy in Canada rose last year after three consecutive years of decline, driven primarily by lower mortality rates among middle-aged and older adults, according to a new report by Statistics Canada. However, it remains below pre-pandemic levels. Canada recorded 326,571 deaths in 2023, a 2.4 percent decrease from the year prior, according to a […]
title: Canadians’ Life Expectancy up for First Time in 3 Years, Still Below Pre-Pandemic Levels: StatCan

description: As post offices across the country lay unseasonably quiet, seven in ten Canadians say they’ve been impacted by the strike, according to a new Angus Reid poll. title: Most Canadians Impacted by Postal Strike, Divided on Sympathy for Workers: Poll
